title: WULFUL Men's Slim Fit Skinny Stretch Comfy Jeans Denim Pants
description: DESIGN STYLE: Slim fit jeans for men,simple style,basic mens jeans, suitable for everyday wear. Cotton material,moisture absorption perspiration fibre,soft,making men feel good when wearing it. Good stretchy material,comfortable, making men move freely in it. Slim fit and skinny design shows your perfect leg shape, you will looks better after putting it on

QUALITY :Modified technique process, No chemical smell, natural and healthy, Nice cutting in good version style, all the hem is done well.Deep pockets can address your trouble of carrying big stuff, accommodate your keys, cell phone, hairbands,etc

SUIT OCCASION:Such slim fit Jeans go well with shirt,T-shirt,pullover,jacket.Simple style, suitable for dating, hanging out, work, school, casual, party, outdoor activities or relaxing weekends. Light up others’ eye, making you the focus

SIZE NOTE: We recommend you to check our size chart carefully before purchasing. If you want tighter feeling,just choose the true size. If you want loose feeling or you have big belly or wide waist, please choose one size bigger
NOTE: Please reference to the“ product description” before purchasing, choose your favorite colors and style, and refer the size chart , choose according to your size
